  • Reference

    Generate Item parameters

    genIRTpar.Rd

    Generate Item parameters

    Usage

    genIRTpar(nitem = 25, ncat = 4, nfac = 3)

    Arguments

    nitem

    a numeric indicating the number of items

    ncat

    a numeric indicating the number of categories

    nfac

    a numeric indicating the number of factors

    Examples

    genIRTpar(20, 4, 3)
#>           a1        a2        a3        d1            d2         d3
